channel.title: CVE Feed for Zyxel -- XGS2220-30 firmware
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zyxel -- XGS2220-30 firmware

item.title: CVE-2023-28768|2023-08-14T16:10:27.201Z -- zyxel -- xgs2220-30%20firmware
item.description: Improper frame handling in the Zyxel XGS2220-30 firmware version V4.80(ABXN.1), XMG1930-30 firmware version V4.80(ACAR.1), and XS1930-10 firmware versionÂ V4.80(ABQE.1) could allow an unauthenticated LAN-based attacker to cause denial-of-service (DoS) conditions by sending crafted frames to an affected switch.
